General.Name: Bolt Projects Holdings, Inc.
General.Description: Bolt Projects Holdings, Inc. develops and produces biomaterials products in the United States. It offers b-silk and xl-silk that are biodegradable and vegan protein polymer and replacement for silicone elastomers in beauty and personal care. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 2261 Market Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94114
